flawed_nl_solution:
Half of the book means 500 / 2 = <<500/2=250.0>>250.0 pages.
Reading the first half took Jane 250.0 / 10 = <<250.0/10=52.0>>52.0 days.
Reading the second half of the book took Jane 250.0 / 5 = <<250.0/5=50.0>>50.0 days.
So in total Jane needed 52.0 + 50.0 = <<52.0+50.0=102.0>>102.0 days to read the whole book.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25.0, not 52.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
